label: cascading_failure_01_dx_auth_audit_005
content:

### Alerts
- [WARNING] idp_health: 6 OIDC discovery errors
- [ERROR] idp_health: 28 SAML assertion errors
- [WARNING] idp_health: 2 JWKS fetch errors

### Deployments & Changes
- Updated JWKS for internal clients; monitored for signature validation errors; none sustained.
- Processed high volume of access requests ahead of quarterly review; enforced two-person approval for privileged roles.
- Audit ingest lag increased after enabling additional token rotation telemetry; reduced by scaling audit workers and increasing batch flush interval.
- Evidence exports rerun with narrower time windows; stored in GRC vault.
- Directory sync: 24 runs; 2230 objects updated; 17 objects deleted; no failures; average duration 92 sec.
- Compliance controls: 12 SOX checks; 16 SOC2 checks; 2 open exceptions; 1 closed exception.
- Helpdesk: 338 access requests; 224 password resets; 61 MFA resets; median first response 24 min.
- Admin approvals: 66 pending; 4 auto-approved; 12 rejected; average approval time 67 min.

### Events
- Audit ingest lag increased after enabling additional token rotation telemetry; reduced by scaling audit workers and increasing batch flush interval.
- Two evidence exports failed due to report size limits; reran with narrower time windows and stored in GRC vault.
- Updated JWKS for several internal clients; monitored for signature validation errors; none sustained.
- Processed high volume of access requests ahead of quarterly review meeting; enforced two-person approval for privileged roles.

### On-Call
- Shift: K. Morgan. 4 pages. 14 tickets. Status: Busy but controlled; worker scaling applied and reports rerun.
